function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Improved access to prevention measures and treatment, public health education","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Develop channels for non-participating managers to access information and resources, such as online platforms or local knowledge sharing events.","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Fit testing, user seal check, proper sizing","category":"Ensure use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Support local production, enhance capacity building","category":"Absorb resource shortages","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Develop affordable transportation options, reduce entrance fees, and provide flexible visiting hours","category":"Optimize users flows to prevent contamination","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Implement dynamic data collection and real-time adaptation in simulation model","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of copper or copper alloys","category":"Selection of materials","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Monitoring and control of indoor air quality","category":"Monitor and control indoor air quality","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Establish effective partnerships at the community level, empower community health volunteers, and ensure last-mile distribution of health information and supplies","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Establishing a web-based database as a clearing house for research activities, and fostering international collaboration among wbe principal investigators.","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Design buildings with optimized size, location, and orientation of openings to minimize mosquito access.","category":"Optimize users flows to prevent contamination","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Developing more comprehensive pandemic response strategies","category":"Sustained enforcement of anti-contagion policies and public health measures","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Conducting extensive research and clinical studies on gated communities and covid-19 spread","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Establish ethical guidelines and ensure transparency, fairness, and accountability.","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Diversification of services, investment in digital marketing, and development of covid-safe event protocols","category":"Shift controls (occupancy control of total users)","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Closure of schools and universities","category":"Shift controls (occupancy control of total users)","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement advanced tracking and monitoring systems for mobility and contact data to gather real-time information on disease spread.","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Robot-controlled noncontact uv surface disinfection","category":"Cleaning technologies (robots)","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of standardized classification frameworks and clarity in defining intervention categories.","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Carry out extensive public education on 5g technology, its safety measures, and health effects. Implement transparent monitoring and reporting of radiation levels.","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement strict social distancing measures and outdoor dining regulations","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Financial support, extended payment options, investment in infrastructure maintenance","category":"Maintanence / systems, and public health measures","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement regular cleaning and disinfection protocols, and design turnaround for test results","category":"Early detection","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incentivizing growth capital investment","category":"Absorb surge in service demande","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conduct further testing and validation to account for the learning phase, and consider data normalization techniques.","category":"Early awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement targeted vaccination campaigns for elderly populations","category":"Quarantine support","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementing social distancing, wearing masks, and improving ventilation to disperse and filter out particles.","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement energy-efficient ventilation systems and air
